articles.title: The 1918 Flu Pandemic Did Not Disproportionately Kill Healthy Young People - Technology Networks
articles.description: Researchers from McMaster University and the University of Colorado Boulder analyzed ancient skeletal remains to further understand the death toll of the 1918 influenza pandemic, commonly referred to as the “Spanish flu”.

articles.title: Chandrayaan-4 mission in spotlight after ISRO logs massive success with Chandrayaan-3 mission - HT Tech
articles.description: Chandrayaan-4 mission has grabbed the spotlight as ISRO winds down the Chandrayaan-3 mission again. ISRO is preparing for the LUPEX mission in collaboration with JAXA.
